content.rendered:
A Trusted Expert in Medical Cannabis & Integrative Medicine

  • Homepage

If you’re looking for a speaker who simplifies complex medical topics and makes them engaging, Dr. Joseph Rosado is the perfect choice. As a physician, author, and medical cannabis expert, he has helped thousands of patients, educated healthcare professionals, and shaped policies around medical cannabis.

Call or Text Us!
(888) 971-5577

Learn More about Dr. Joseph Rosado And Why he is a good fit for your next event

Dr. Rosado shares his medical expertise on national and international platforms and currently serves as the medical director of Northeast FL Health Services DBA Family Health Source, a Federally Qualified Health Center in Volusia County, FL. In this role, he oversees the Medical Management Program, ensuring quality healthcare services. Additionally, he is the president and CEO of International Medical Consultants, co-Medical Director for Minorities 4 Medical Marijuana, Medical Director for marijuanadoctors.com, and serves on the scientific advisory boards for Medical Extractos in Colombia and Ellipsis in Canada.

As an advocate, Dr. Rosado has been a speaker for political campaigns and medical cannabis organizations while working with patients of all ages for cannabis recommendations and management. He provides consulting services to physicians and patients worldwide. As an author, he has published articles in medical journals, written the bestselling book Hope and Healing – A Case for Medical Cannabis, and been quoted in Rolling Stone. His accolades include the 2019 Physician of the Year Award from the Volusia County Hispanic Chamber of Commerce and recognition as a leading figure in cannabis by The WeedHead and Green Entrepreneur.

Why Book Dr. Rosado for Your Event?

Dr. Rosado’s talks are easy to understand, evidence-based, and filled with real-life stories from his medical practice. Whether you need a keynote speaker for a medical conference, a panelist for a policy discussion, or a trainer for healthcare professionals, his insights provide practical knowledge that can be applied immediately.

Book Dr. Rosado

Each presentation is customized to fit the audience

Speaking Topics & Expertise

Dr. Joseph Rosado covers a wide range of topics related to medical cannabis, integrative medicine, and patient care. His presentations are tailored to medical professionals, policymakers, industry leaders, and the general public, ensuring that each audience receives practical, easy-to-understand information.

Key Topics Dr. Rosado Speaks On:

Medical Cannabis & Patient Care
The Science of the Endocannabinoid System.
Cannabis for Neurological & Mental Health Disorders
Medical Cannabis Laws & Policy.
Integrative Medicine & Holistic Healing.

Some of Dr. Rosado’s signature talks include topics on:

Baby Boomers and Medical Cannabis
Can Medical Cannabis Positively Influence the Mortality Rate in your country?
Introduction to Medical Cannabis-An Overview of How it Works and Treatment Opportunities
Medical Cannabis For Alzheimer’s Disease-Is it An Option?
Medical Cannabis For Autism-Is it An Option?
And More
Book Dr. Rosado For Speaking

Book Dr. Joseph Rosado For Your Next Event

If you want a dynamic, engaging and knowledgeable speaker for your next conference, seminar, or panel discussion Joseph Rosado, MD, brings years of medical expertise, real-world patient insights, and research-backed knowledge to every speaking engagement. His ability to simplify complex medical cannabis and integrative health topics makes him a sought-after speaker worldwide.

Why Hire Dr. Rosado?
Expert in Medical Cannabis & Integrative Medicine – Decades of experience treating patients and educating professionals.
Engaging & Actionable Presentations – Delivers easy-to-understand, evidence-based insights that audiences can apply immediately.
Customizable Keynotes & Workshops – Tailors content to healthcare providers, businesses, policymakers, and the general public.
Recognized Authority in the Industry – Featured on major media outlets, published author, and policy advisor.
Speaking Engagement Options
Keynote Speeches – High-impact presentations at medical and cannabis conferences.
Panel Discussions – Expert insights on legislative, medical, and industry trends.
Workshops & Training Sessions – Educating healthcare professionals and business leaders on cannabis science and policy.
Corporate & Industry Events – Tailored discussions on the business and healthcare aspects of medical cannabis.

How to Book Dr. Rosado

1

Submit A Request

Submit a request through our online form or contact our team directly.

2

Schedule A Call

Schedule a consultation to discuss event goals and audience needs.

3

Get The Details

Confirm event details and let Dr. Rosado bring expert insights to your audience.

Book Dr. Rosado

Media Features & Global Recognition

Dr. Joseph Rosado is a recognized thought leader in medical cannabis and integrative medicine. His expertise has been featured on major news networks, industry conferences, and medical summits worldwide. Through his media appearances, he continues to educate the public and professionals on the science, benefits, and policies surrounding medical cannabis.

Featured In

Television & News Outlets: Dr. Rosado has been interviewed on ABC, CBS, NBC, FOX, Univision, and Telemundo, where he shares expert insights on the evolving role of medical cannabis in healthcare.
Podcasts & Radio Shows: He has been a guest on top medical and cannabis-related podcasts, including NPR affiliates, discussing patient success stories, cannabis research, and policy changes.
Published & Quoted In: Dr. Rosado’s insights have been featured in The WeedHead, Cannabis Business Times, and other leading medical cannabis publications, positioning him as a trusted voice in the industry.
International Speaker: He has spoken at conferences across North America, Latin America, and Europe, helping bridge the knowledge gap between healthcare providers, lawmakers, and patients.

Notable Past Events & Conferences

Dr. Joseph Rosado has spoken at leading medical, cannabis, and health conferences worldwide, delivering insightful presentations on medical cannabis research, patient care, and industry regulations. His experience on stage allows him to engage diverse audiences, from healthcare professionals to legislators and business leaders.

Select Past Speaking Engagements

CannaWorld Congress – Delivered an expert talk on cannabis and patient care, highlighting clinical applications and real-world outcomes.
CBD Expo 2019 – Shared groundbreaking research on the therapeutic benefits of cannabinoids and how they interact with the human body.
Hempfest Panel 2019 – Joined a panel discussion on the legal and medical challenges of cannabis policy reform.
Expomedweed Event – Spoke on the global impact of medical cannabis and how different countries are shaping their cannabis laws.
The Wolf’s Den Podcast – Featured in a deep-dive conversation about the business and science of medical cannabis, offering expert insights to listeners.

Dr. Rosado’s Professional Affiliations & Leadership Roles

Dr. Joseph Rosado is more than just a speaker—he is an active leader in the medical cannabis and healthcare industries. His expertise extends beyond public speaking, as he holds key positions in multiple organizations that are shaping the future of integrative medicine.

Current Leadership Roles

President & CEO – International Medical Consultants – Providing expert guidance on medical cannabis treatments and healthcare solutions worldwide.
Co-Medical Director – Minorities 4 Medical Marijuana – Advocating for diversity, equity, and inclusion in cannabis access and education.
Policy Advisor – Consulting with healthcare organizations, legislators, and industry leaders to develop ethical, patient-focused medical cannabis policies.

Past Leadership Roles

Medical Director – Northeast FL Health Services (Family Health Source) – Leading medical cannabis and patient-centered care initiatives.
Medical Director – MarijuanaDoctors.com – Educating patients and physicians on safe, evidence-based cannabis treatments.
